code: import axios from'axios';export var getArticles=function getArticles(topic,sort_by,article_id){if(article_id){return axios.get("http://callum-goodley-nc-news-app.herokuapp.com/api/articles/".concat(article_id)).then(function(article){return article.data.article;});}else{return axios.get("http://callum-goodley-nc-news-app.herokuapp.com/api/articles",{params:{topic:topic,sort_by:sort_by}}).then(function(articles){return articles.data.articles;});}};export var getComments=function getComments(article_id){return axios.get("http://callum-goodley-nc-news-app.herokuapp.com/api/articles/".concat(article_id,"/comments")).then(function(comments){return comments.data.comments;});};export var postComment=function postComment(article_id,inputValue,userName){return axios.post("http://callum-goodley-nc-news-app.herokuapp.com/api/articles/".concat(article_id,"/comments"),{body:inputValue,username:userName}).then(function(comments){return comments.data.comment;});};export var deleteComment=function deleteComment(comment_id){return axios.delete("http://callum-goodley-nc-news-app.herokuapp.com/api/comments/".concat(comment_id)).then(function(){return'comment deleted';});};export var incrementVotes=function incrementVotes(comment_id,article_id,increment_by){if(comment_id){return axios.patch("http://callum-goodley-nc-news-app.herokuapp.com/api/comments/".concat(comment_id),{inc_votes:increment_by}).then(function(comment){return comment.data.comment;});}else{return axios.patch("http://callum-goodley-nc-news-app.herokuapp.com/api/articles/".concat(article_id),{inc_votes:increment_by}).then(function(comment){return comment.data.comment;});}};
